page.title: 03HIGHBRIDGE CARAVAN CENTRE
page.content: THE CARAVAN CENTRE AT HIGHBRIDGE WAS BEGUN SOME TWENTY YEARS AGO FOR THE SALE OF CARVANS.TODAY IT HAS EXPANDED INTO A LARGE DISPLAY AREA,A SHOP AND A REPAIR WORKSHOP. IT IS SITUATED ON THE A38 ON THE NORTHERN OUTSKIRTS OF HIGHBRIDGE.CLOSE LINKS EXIST WITH A HOLIDAY CARAVAN SITE IN BURNHAM-ON-SEA,A SIMILAR SITE ON THE OUTSKIRTS OF WESTON-SUPER-MARE AND A CARAVAN CONSTRUCTION UNIT AT WORLE. THE DISPLAY AREA OCCUPIE'S A LARGE FIELD BEHIND THE SHOP.ROADS HAVE BEEN BUILT AND NEW AND SECOND-HAND CARAVANS ARE ON OFFER. THE REPAIR WORKSHOP DEALS WITH MOTORIST PROBLEMS AND WITH REPAIR TO CARAVANS RECEIVED FOR SALE. THE SHOP HAS AN EXTENSIVE RANGE OF CARAVAN EQUIPMENT FOR SALE.THIS INCLUDES MATERIAL FOR D.I.Y CARAVANERS AND ACCESSORIE'S.
